name: WELLEXLY HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sarikart - Promoting weavers & artisans, strengthening handlooms.


Sarikart is a dream one stop shop for everything authentic woven in natural fibres.

We partner with government registered weavers, most of whom are National award winners in their respective categories to provide you- the convenience of Trusted Online Shopping of Pure and authentic high quality Sarees.

We adopt a thoughtful approach in sourcing and curetting authentic sarees from weavers across the various states of India, that are synonymous and globally acclaimed for a specific type of fabric or style.

We display a range of authentic handloom products that brings weavers from across India ,closer to customers. Weavers display their work on our portal; every product is handcrafted and exclusive. Most weaver products have a handloom and silk mark certification.

As per 4th All India Handloom Census, there are over 26+ lac weavers pan India; over 72% are women and over 75% have not completed high school. Over 93% have a household income of less than Rs. 10,000 a month and over 60% live in a kuccha dwelling.

Through this platform we would appeal to our customers to endorse these graceful handlooms and support and cheer our weavers. Every purchase made by you will motivate them continue weaving their specialities and build a better future and uplift the rich textile heritage of India
name: SARIKART ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Kreativ Genes is a Performance digital marketing agency started in August 2020. Kreativgenes has been founded by a team of professionals and budding entrepreneurs who are focused on creating highly personalized and sophisticated digital marketing solutions to boost the online visibility and overall business growth of the client.

The latest Projects under process at Kreativ Genes are:

• Kreativgenes is dedicated in developing effective digital marketing solutions that are bespoke and tailormade to achieve desired outcomes.

• The main aim behind founding Kreativgenes is to empower and enable our clients to make best use of the digital marketing services to harness the complete potential of their business and initiate an increase in revenue generation.

• We believe in providing beautiful digital experience with a purpose, so that our customers not only experience the technological revolution which is going on around the globe in a beautiful manner but also in a user-friendly way that apparently suits their need.

• We at Kreativgenes are oriented in developing social innovation that will enable people to do what they want to do. We want people to harness their creativity in the best way they can so that we all move towards productive social culture. We want people to step forward with us in this technological world so that no one is left behind.

• The long-term goal of Kreativgenes is to earn the trust of the clients by building strong business relationship and providing superior service to match the motivations and goals of the customers.


We want to carve a niche for ourselves by helping other business streamline marketing budget by using Growth marketing strategies. We also have two startups at validation stages each in sectors including Health & Hospitality. Our team is focussed on creating value adding business and create diverse revenue stream for long run which can help sustain and grow the business.
name: SVARAJYA E-COMMERCE LLP

idea: Medcult Healthcare is focused to bring the cutting-edge technology and advancement in Medical & Diagnostic Equipment and devices to entire healthcare fraternity to resolve their current challenges and issues by bridging the gap of demand and supply. Our vision is to introduce and support the implementation of innovative medical treatments to replace outdated traditional procedures and technologies
name: MEDCULT HEALTHCARE LLP

idea:
https://arriocs.com/We, at ARRIO CONSULTANCY SERVICES LLP. believe that wealth can be created and made secured, as it is a well-disciplined, well-planned process. And we know how to execute it in a beneficial way.


Our team carry experience of 2+ decades with the expertise as Business consultant, Investments and Capital Market & Cyber security consultant.


Our Team from ARRIO CONSULTANCY SERVICES will be helpful for you to implement Cyber security compliance's within your organisation which includes both Services & Products, also we support our customers to improvise the business process flow with Automatons which will increase the productivity with good quality and cost effectiveness. We also helps our customers for Investment plans which helps to increase the passive income from the investments. For more details related to Business consultancy ans Investment Services please visit our website: www.arriocs.com


Below are our Cyber security Solutions and Services for your reference


Products & Solutions:

• Vulnerability Assessment (VA)

• Penetration Testing (PT)

• WIFI Penetration Testing

• Asset Management (AM)

• Inventory Management

• Data Leak Prevention (DLP)

• Patch Management

• Data Encryption Solutions

• Email Security

• Web Application Firewall


Services :

• Compliance Implementation

• Cyber Security awareness Training
